item.title: Forecasting for Humans
item.description: Introduction For the past 3 years, I have had this idea of building a better forecasting system for business users. Business users mostly live on spreadsheets and the goal I had was to take advanced forecasting techniques to business users. Forecasting is one of the most challenging and hard problems in ML given the wide variety of domains it is applied to and the various ways available to solve this problem.
